responsibilities: Developed an algorithm Bug Tracker that removed duplicate entry of records, resolved data inconsistencies, and prevented app crashes resulting in improved data integrity and optimized sorting and filtering of records.

Implemented a Custom Chatbot using FastAPI + LangChain + GPT-4 with integrated Prompt Engineering for accurate natural language understanding. The bot is capable of handling voice input, multilingual translation, command-based actions (e.g. create room, fetch user groups) and generating intelligent, dynamic replies.

Deployed a Generative AI project that creates realistic video advertisements and promotions of products using custom AI avatars and voice synthesis, capable of doing product promotions from any script that enhances user engagement and automating ad content creation for personal brands and commercial products.
Built a real-time data synchronization pipeline using Kafka and Redis to handle 500K+ daily events with 130ms latency, improving user data consistency across distributed services.
Spearheaded containerization and CI/CD pipeline migration to GitHub Actions and Kubernetes, cutting deployment time from hours to 15 minutes.
Led the architecture and development of a scalable multi-tenant service orchestration platform, enabling dynamic service provisioning across internal teams, reducing onboarding time by 60%.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to optimize performance bottlenecks in API gateway, achieving a 3x throughput improvement through caching strategies and thread-level service scaling.
Conducted design reviews and mentored 6+ junior engineers, leading efforts in tech documentation, code quality improvements, and knowledge sharing.

projects.name: API Rate Limiting Gateway
projects.description: Built a lightweight API gateway with token bucket rate-limiting per user and per API, capable of handling 1M+ requests per day with minimal latency overhead.

projects.name: Cloud Cost Analyzer Tool
projects.description: Created a full-stack internal tool for real-time cost monitoring across AWS services, visualizing daily/monthly spend and forecasting based on usage trends.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science, Computer Software Engineering
